Metaknowledge Spring Retreat 2016
posted on March 15, 2016

Our lab is very interdisciplinary. We are extensively doing research in the field of science of science. We collaborate with a group of scientists from different fields connected throught the Metaknowledge Research Network. Titipat Achakvulsit, Daniel Acuna, and Konrad Kording attended their Spring retreat between March 14 and 15. Many interesting projects came out of this meeting. You will see the result of these projects soon!
